ygData.msgSnippet: A good way to request an enhancement or new feature in Cantera is to use the RFE feature at the Cantera Sourceforge site.  This insures that your request

A good way to request an enhancement or new feature in Cantera is to 
use the 'RFE' feature at the Cantera Sourceforge site.  This insures 
that your request won't be forgotten about.  Of course, I can't promise 
when or if the feature desired will be added (depends on whether it is 
easy or hard to do).  But at least there will be a record of what was 
requested, and the disposition of the request.  They provide a similar 
mechanism to report bugs.
